title: Merilytics | Senior Business Analyst | Hyderabad
content:
* Education: BTech from IIT
* Years of Experience: 0
* Prior Experience: None (Fresher)
* Date of the Offer: Q3 2023
* Company: Merilytics
* Title/Level: Senior Business Analyst
* Location: Hyderabad, India
* Salary: INR 7,00,000
* Relocation: One week of hotel accomodation
* Retention Bonus: INR 1,30,000
* Stock bonus: None
* Bonus: INR 70,000
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): INR 9,00,000
* Benefits: 50% cab reimbersement, dinner reimbersement upto INR 200 (if working after 8 PM)
* Other details: WFH on Wednesday, 60 days Notice Period, Service based firm, No WLB
